# Notes



<child_page>
# sitemap.xml and robots.txt files

Add /sitemap.xml to any home URL to get a list of all its sub URLs for recursive crawling.
Add /robots.txt to any home URL to check the siteâ€™s crawling limitations.
</child_page>
